channel.title: Not Installed yet I have all the files?
channel.description: I cant seem to find black mesa i assumed it would be in the steam game library but it isnt, i tried starting source sdk 2007 but that didnt work either. i tried reinstalling like 3 times to different places but its never there. what am i doing wrong? i just wanna continue playing the game :c

item.title: Not Installed yet I have all the files?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
well you can launch Source SDK 2007 with the command line -game “C:\Program Files(x86)\Steam\SteamApps\SourceMods\BMS” if your OS is 32bit remove (x86)

Read full topic
item.source: Not Installed yet I have all the files?

item.title: Not Installed yet I have all the files?
item.dc:creator: Noobnoko
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Did you restart Steam after installing?

Yeah and after installing I click on the run option after. that was the only way i could play it.even if i restarted steam on one of the times i tried installing it, it still never showed up.

Read full topic
